content: @starseeker have you seen https://coala.io/ ? ran into them at gci, they apparently wrap a whole suite of tools like clang, flawfinder, cmake-lint, ... (the latter was new to me, https://github.com/richq/cmake-lint )
No that one is new to me (both coala and cmake-lint)
I wonder if cmake-lint can deal with our CMake code... that might be a tall order
